content: this legal text summarizes a court case that took place in mantova the court dissolved a community object which included real estate properties owned by two individuals the court approved a project for the division of the properties and assigned sums of money to each party involved a notary was authorized to make payments related to the enforcement procedure the text mentions various legal codes and procedures that were followed throughout the case the costs were confirmed and a notary was appointed the tribunal made decisions regarding the dissolution approved the grounds for the project assigned specific sums of money to the parties involved and authorized the notary to make payments through a postal bank booklet one party was ordered to reimburse the bank for costs related to the judgment finally the land revenue agency was ordered to transcribe the judgment
